description: Source file implementing the SysUtilStub class and related functions for system utility operations, including command execution, prerequisites setup, and cleanup, with external linkage for object creation and destruction.

classes.name: SysUtilAgent
classes.description: Main class providing system utility functions such as executing commands and handling prerequisites in a testing framework.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Sets up prerequisites for the module, calls ssp_register, and returns status.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Resets or cleans up prerequisites, returns true.

methods.name: SysUtilAgent::initialize
methods.description: Initializes the SysUtilAgent object with given version, preparing it for operations.

methods.name: SysUtilAgent::SysUtilAgent_ExecuteCmd
methods.description: Executes a command received in JSON request, captures output, and updates response.

methods.name: SysUtilAgent::SysUtilAgent_ExecuteCmdReboot
methods.description: Executes a reboot command received in JSON request, primarily intended to reboot the system.

methods.name: SysUtilAgent * CreateObject(TcpSocketServer & ptrtcpServer)
methods.description: Factory function to create and return a new SysUtilAgent object.

methods.name: bool cleanup(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Performs cleanup operations for the module.

methods.name: void DestroyObject(SysUtilAgent * stubobj)
methods.description: Destroys the SysUtilAgent object, freeing resources.

methods.name: void SysUtilAgent_ExecuteCmd(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void SysUtilAgent_ExecuteCmdReboot(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)

ctags.name: SysUtilAgent_ExecuteCmd
ctags.pattern: /^void SysUtilAgent::SysUtilAgent_ExecuteCmd(IN const Json::Value& req, OUT Json::Value& response)$/
